name: Bust (Rui Moreira)
description:
You are a soldier who was trying to get to war, so you could make your mom proud. During your flight, Buster the main character jumps out to early and lands on mysterious island. Now you need to discover more about the island, unravel her secrets and defeat all puzzles she has for you.

This Game was made for my Graduation Project back in 2019, developed by a team of three, me Rui Moreira (3D Micro Assets, Character Artist, Animator and Concept Artist), Jorge Antão (Programmer, UI/UX Developer and Sound Developer) and Miguel Souto (3D Macro Assets, Environment Artist and Concept Artist).

Hope you like it. Don't forget to leave some feed.
